name: Climatic War
description:
=============================
The ice caps are melting away all over the North Pole, and predators are fighting to claim what's left of it. Many are targeting your home, and you ninja-fighter penguin cannot allow that.
Your ice floe is melting away too. Make them understand the hard way that there's no room for them.
=============================
This is an arena beat'em up, where the arena is an ice floe that is slowly shrinking as time goes on . (don't fall!)
Bipedal polar bears, ninja walruses and narwhals will try to take you down. Punch and kick them to earn score points, you'll receive a big bonus if you survive until the timer ends! The goal is to get the highest score!

>> Controls :
- Arrow keys : Movement and attack directions
- A* : Normal attacks (press repeatedly for combos)
- S : Special attacks
- Space or W* : Jump (penguins are flightless birds and can't do air attacks, but jumping will help if you get buried)
- Escape : Quit the game
*(on the French version : Q for normal attacks, Space or Z to jump)

Attacks change depending on which arrow key you are holding. The ninja-fighter penguin has a neutral combo, a side combo, an up combo and a down combo. He also has a neutral special attack and a side special attack.

Programmer : Kadronk (Newgrounds, Twitter)
Game designers : Lisa Schotte and Louis Descamps
Artists : Alan Coeugnet (Artstation), Chloé Hecquefeuille (Artstation, Twitter), Mathilde Kerckhove (Instagram) and Emma Delautel (Artstation)
Music : FruityAudio - Just Rock!
